remarks: An equivalent of the orthomodular law.  Theorem 29.13(e) of [MaedaMaeda] p. 132.  (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjoml2.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
pjoml2.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
pjoml6i $p |- ( A C_ B -> E. x e. CH ( A C_ ( _|_ ` x ) /\ ( A vH x ) = B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
